sentences.en: Cor .1:17 This therefore intending , did I then use fickleness?
sentences.cn: 林后一17我有这样的意思, 难道是行事轻浮么?

sentences.en: His story became a parable for the fickleness of art and life.
sentences.cn: 他的故事成为一个说明艺术与生活变化无常的寓言。

sentences.en: However love will never tolerate half - heartedness and fickleness.
sentences.cn: 然而,爱情绝不会容忍半心半意和变化无常.

sentences.en: I feel incisive and vivid, with fickleness faded.
sentences.cn: 淋漓尽致间, 浮噪的情绪,慢慢地退去.

sentences.en: Instead, the green full of streets suppresses the fickleness and adds a little harmoniousness.
sentences.cn: 倒是这满街的绿,生生地把这点浮躁压了下去,平添了几分清雅和恬淡.

sentences.en: This therefore intending , did I then use fickleness?
sentences.cn: 17我有这样的意思, 难道是行事轻浮么?

sentences.en: Tranquinessl can cause you look clearly omnipresent fickleness.
sentences.cn: 平静,也使你的面容变得越来越祥和,这是相由心生.

sentences.en: While she always criticized the fickleness of human nature.
sentences.cn: 她一方面总是批评人的本性朝三暮四.

words.tran_cn: 浮躁的；易变的；变幻无常的

trans.tran_cn: 易变，无常，浮躁，变化无常
